Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.utils

Contains helper methods which are used overall in the project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorUtils
    This class implements some color related helpers methods.
    ColorUtils.HSV
    HSV presentation of color
    CurveUtils
    This class implements some helpers methods for Curve instances This code is based on js-code written by zz85 http://www.lab4games.net/zz85/blog
    FontUtils  
    GeometryUtils
    This class implements some helpers methods for geometry.
    SceneUtils
    The class implements some 3D Scene related helper methods The code is based on js-code written by alteredq http://alteredqualia.com/
    ShapeUtils
    The class implements some 3D Shape related helper methods The code is based on js-code written by zz85
    UniformsUtils
    The class implements some Uniform related helper methods

Package thothbot.parallax.core.shared.utils Description

Contains helper methods which are used overall in the project.
